participant_1.background:
I used to be more spontaneous with my painting.
I can swim if I have to, but I prefer to save my energy for my vintage cars.
i have six siblings.

i am witty.

participant_2.background:
I'm a big fan of horror movies, but I know my parents wouldn't approve.
i flirted with the dmv officer in order to pass my driving exam.
I love to go on hikes with my friends and enjoy the fresh air and beautiful scenery.
I am allergic to a lot of things, but I love grilling meat for my family
I am looking for a home that is close to my parents so that I can easily help them out as they get older.

content.text: Hey there, what are you up to this evening?
I am just about to head out for a hike with some friends, how about you?
I am just relaxing at home painting some vintage cars, I would love to go hiking sometime though!
That sounds like fun! I love to paint too, but I haven't had the time to do it recently.
Yeah I get that, I have six siblings, so it's hard to find time for myself.
Oh wow, I can't imagine having that many siblings! How do you manage?
It's tough sometimes, but it's also a lot of fun! We're all really close and we do a lot of things together.
That's really nice! I'm close with my brother, but I don't have any sisters.
Well, I'm glad you have a close relationship with your brother!
So, what do you like to do on your hikes?
I like to go for long walks, enjoy the scenery, and take pictures of the nature around me.
That sounds really nice! I would love to see some of your photos sometime.
Sure, I'd be happy to share them with you!
Awesome! I'll send them to you later.
